product_list.paragraph: A number of alluring benefits are included with the Niyo Global Credit Card, which is issued by SBM Bank. These benefits include no foreign exchange markup, free access to airport lounges at international terminals in India, and no transaction fees on limitless overseas purchases. In urban areas, transactions are completed within three days, but in outlying areas, it might take up to five days. In addition, there are no annual or account opening fees associated with the card. The cost that is applicable is either ₹500 plus GST or 2.5% of the total value of the transaction, whichever is larger. When you keep your balance at zero, there is no fee associated with it. You may earn up to 7.25% per year on your fixed deposit that is tied to the card, and you can load INR to spend in more than 130 other currencies across more than 150 destinations.
